task.summary: Default task
* Removed unused `div#top-navigation-menu` definition
* Removed unused `nav div.nav ul li` definition
- updated OpusPrimusRouter class to check for child theme and use its folders as defined
- REVERT: updated OpusPrimusRouter class to check for child theme and use its folders as defined
- documentation updates
* Replaced the majority of `require_once` calls with `locate_template` calls * Replaced `global` variable calls with `new` class instances
- white space clean-up
* Better code organization to only load classes when needed
* Added empty hooks before and after showing the breadcrumbs
- Adjust SlickNav init to start at 50em (mostly for iPhone 6 Plus so far) but should be fine everywhere
* Update to use `preg_match_all` in OpusPrimusGallery featured and secondary id methods
* Added BNS Login compatibility to use `dashicons` display
* Added OpusPrimusComments class methods to `functions.php` to work-around duplicate output issue
* Added `width: auto;` for `th` and `td` elements
* Added Gravity Forms compatibility (not implemented, yet)
* Added Gravity Forms compatibility (for reCaptcha form)
* Added `#header-widgets` to the "Clearance" section of `opus-primus.css`
- `readme.txt` updates
- tagged 1.3-beta1
* Added minor `attachment` related styles
* Added checks for Child-Theme and relevant references to `opus_primus_support_comment` * Moved `support_comment` method to `functions.php` to eliminate duplicate output
* Added search form margin property
- inline documentation updates
* Added better search form aesthetics in the sidebar
- final `changelog.txt`, `readme.txt` and `index.php` inline documentation updates prior to public release
- version updated to 1.3
* Extracted the Opus Primus PullQuotes Stanza
- added link to Opus Primus PullQuotes GitHub repository
- update copyright years to include 2015
- clean out test code
- copyright year update and minor documentation
* Added `=== Screen Reader Text ===` CSS section * Change to use `get_the_posts_pagination`
* Inline documentation clean-up and re-organization
* Incorporated WordPress recommended styles for `.screen-reader-text` class
* Added `hide_category_widget_list_items` method and related hook * Updated `hooks-filters.txt` file
- documentation correction
* Added `h5.comment-link` definition to provide a better aesthetic location
- prepared as 1.3.1-alpha (internal only)
* Change method to return the Featured Thumbnail versus outputting it
* Added some escaping sanitization and linked Featured Image to post via the post ID
* Begin removal of extraneous end of structure comments ... * Extracted code from `featured_thumbnail` method to create `featured_thumbnail_single_view` method
* Added `opus_featured_thumbnail_single_view_portrait` filter hook and updated `hooks-filters.txt`
- re-organized methods to read in a better flow
* Changed from using `get_the_time` to `date_i18n` for `OpusPrimusImages::exif_timestamp` method
- remove testing code
* Added styling to navigation for moving within a single post's pages * Improved look of navigation links mimicking the site page navigation
- Rare Disease Day 2015 recognition
- update to correct theme version numbers

- Rare Disease Day 2015 recognition

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - update to correct theme version numbers
